 */import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{register,reset}from'../features/auth/authSlice';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{Container,Box,Typography,TextField,Button,CircularProgress,Card,CardContent,Alert}from'@mui/material';/**
